text: Karl-Hans Laermann (26 December 1929 â€“ 26 June 2024) was a German politician. He was born in Kaulhausen, Germany. He is a member of the Free Democratic Party. From 1974 to 1998, he was a member of the Bundestag. From October to November 1994, he was Minister of Education and Research of Germany.Karl-Hans Laermann biography at Bundestag.de ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Politicians of the Free Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Education ministers of Germany
title: Karl-Hans Laermann
